name: Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



Based on the upcoming Disney Channel Original Movie of the same name, Phineas and Ferb: Across the Second Dimension for Nintendo DS takes players on an exciting

journey through all new environments in an all new fun-filled game. Play as Phineas, Ferb or Agent P and master combat techniques to battle and overcome enemy drones using

gadgets and combat maneuvers while leveling up through over 30 stages to defeat the evil Dr. D and his robot army and save the Tri-State area.

Features

• Play as Phineas, Ferb or Agent P and unlock a special bonus-a new secret Agent• Jump, dodge and battle through 5 outrageous worlds with over 30 wacky levels• Wield power-packed gadgets such as a baseball launcher, electricity gadget and a grapple gadget and earn upgrades by solving environmental puzzles• Enjoy Platypus Day and Halloween themed environments• Face off with boss enemies including Goozim, Platyborg and Evil Doof

As of May 20, 2014, the Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection service for Nintendo DSi and Wii systems has been retired. Online features of this game are no longer available after this date but this game still provides an entertaining experience in offline mode.
